mapper.insert: insert into stat_chart_config (id, `name`, dep_code, create_date, stat_date, comp_name, `type`, comp_api, user_code, remark, remark2, remark3, params_json, comp_json) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{compApi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramsJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{compJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update stat_chart_config set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep_code = #{depCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stat_date = #{statDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comp_name = #{compName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comp_api = #{compApi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params_json = #{paramsJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, comp_json = #{compJson,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, dep_code, create_date, stat_date, comp_name, `type`, comp_api, user_code, remark, remark2, remark3, params_json, comp_json from stat_chart_config where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.id, a.`name`, a.dep_code, a.create_date, a.stat_date, a.comp_name, a.`type`, a.comp_api, a.user_code, a.remark, a.remark2, a.remark3, a.params_json, a.comp_json,b.username user_name, c.shortname dep_name_abb,c.name dep_name,d.dic_name stat_date1 from stat_chart_config a left join sys_user b on a.user_code=b.id left join sys_depart c on a.dep_code=c.dep_code left join stat_dic_times d on a.stat_date=d.id where a.dep_code like #{depCode} and a.user_code = #{userId}
